alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Le Flore County through 915 AM CDT... At 845 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles west of Spiro to 5 miles southwest of Panama to 4 miles northwest of Fanshawe. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Pocola... Spiro... Panama... Wister... Howe... Bokoshe... Cameron... Shady Point... Rock Island... Cowlington... Scullyville... Braden... Heavener Runestone Park... Milton... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
